title: IO Biotech Inc Stock Valuation and Market Capitalization

content.text: IO Biotech Inc's market capitalization is the total value of its outstanding shares. As of the latest available data, its market capitalization is $X, which is above/below the industry average of $Y.
Valuation ratios provide insights into the relative value of a company's stock compared to its financial performance and industry peers. IO Biotech Inc's valuation ratios include:

The P/E ratio measures the price investors are willing to pay for each dollar of IO Biotech Inc's earnings. IO Biotech Inc has a P/E ratio of X, whereas the industry average is Y. This indicates that IO Biotech Inc may be considered overvalued/undervalued compared to its peers.

The P/S ratio compares the market value of IO Biotech Inc's stock to its annual sales. IO Biotech Inc's P/S ratio is X, while the industry average is Y. This suggests that IO Biotech Inc may be overvalued/undervalued based on its sales performance compared to its industry peers.

The P/B ratio compares the market value of IO Biotech Inc's stock to its book value (total assets minus liabilities). IO Biotech Inc's P/B ratio is X, while the industry average is Y. This indicates that IO Biotech Inc may be overvalued/undervalued relative to its assets compared to its industry peers.
The dividend yield represents the annual dividend payout as a percentage of the stock's current price. IO Biotech Inc does/does not offer dividends.

IO Biotech Inc's market capitalization is $X, which is above/below the industry average. Valuation ratios suggest that the stock may be considered overvalued/undervalued compared to its industry peers. Investors should carefully consider these metrics before making any investment decisions.

news.headline: IO Biotech: A Phase 3 Company Getting No Respect
news.summary: IO Biotech is an immunotherapy biotech in phase 3 trials. Click here to read the analysis of IOBT stock and why it is a tentative buy.
